actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to phase out the earnings test over a 10-year period for individuals who have attained retirement age, and for other purposes.
short_title: Older Americans' Freedom to Work Act of 1994
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Older Americans' Freedom to Work Act of 1994 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to increase the amount of outside income which beneficiaries who have attained retirement age may earn during 1995 through 2004 without incurring a reduction in benefits. Repeals such income limitation in the year 2005.

titles.title: Older Americans' Freedom to Work Act of 1994
A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to phase out the earnings test over a 10-year period for individuals who have attained retirement age, and for other purposes.
